pages.title: Bleeding Carcasses
pages.text: To begin the butchering process you first need to hang and bleed a carcass. All you need is 3 things. $(li)A chain$(li)A hook$(li)A Carcass$(br)Now that you have all three items, place the chain horizontally then place the hook on the chain (right click the chain whilst holding the hook). Now place the carcass on the hook then with a cleaver or knife right click the carcass to begin the bleeding process.
Make sure to place a blood grate below the carcass to catch any blood. Not doing this will cause blood to spill all over the floor.
